children.text:
Software License Agreement of “Menu Translator”
 
 Software license agreement for a smartphone application “Menu Translator” (hereafter referred to as ‘This Agreement’）is achieved between you (whether he/she is an individual or a corporate)and NTT DOCOMO,INC.( hereafter referred to as ‘Our Company’). Please read the following terms of This Agreement, and This Agreement shall be effective from the day of commencing the use of this software.
 
 Part 1. Definition
 
 “This Software” means all-purpose to use the “Menu Translator” program (Includes Translation Dictionary Application) by handset specified by our company. Furthermore, the detail of these functions shall be prescribed separately by Our Company.
 
 (1) Based on the pictorial data through built-in cameras displayed on the screen on designated products (hereafter referred to as ‘designated products’) by Our Company, this Software reads data such as signs, billboards, menus, of which designated language by Our Company that are selected by the customers on the screens of designated products (hereafter referred to as ‘Designated Language Translation’). However each designated language requires to separately installing translation dictionary applications. In some cases such as handwritten or distorted writings, this application may not be able to recognize it.
 (2) As stated in the prior section (1) This Software shall be able to transfer Designated Language Translation data into another application
 (3) Application functions other than listed in the preceding items.
 
 Part 2. Intellectual Property Right
 
 Intellectual property right of This Software is inherited to Our Company and a third party. Our Company has a right to provide the license, and has a right to approve the use of This Software. This Agreement does not give any rights to the customers to transfer the rights to transfer intellectual property rights
 
 Part 3. Authorization of Use
 
 1. According to This Agreement, Our Company grants to our customers an exclusive and non-assignable right to use This Software application only for the designated products for any purpose described in the provisions of Article 1.
 2. This Software application shall cost packed transaction fee for service usage (This fee shall occur during the download and version update of This Software.) Even the customers have a flat-rate contract within Japan, once outside Japan transactions shall not be under the coverage of the flat rate (Excluding the case of “oversea travel flat rate.) Even while the use of oversea flat rate, there are possibilities of overcoming the upper limit in the short term while use of This Software.
 
 Part.4 Effect of This Agreement and Termination
 
 1. In case the customers are not using This Software, deletion or destruction of the possessed software shall terminate This Agreement.
 2. Our Company shall be able to terminate This Agreement without the prior notice to the customers. In this case our company shall post service termination notice onto the homepage, and this announcement shall change or terminate This Agreement.
 3. In case the customers violate any clause of This Agreement, Our Company shall terminate This Agreement.
 4. Customers cannot claim for the compensation of damages or any possible charges that were caused by the termination of This Agreement.
 5. In case of the termination of This Agreement, the customers cannot use This Software in any possible reasons. In this case, the customers shall immediately delete or destroy This Software (includes all copied software) that is under control.
 
 Part 5. Compliance Rules
 
 1. The customers shall not use This Software except for the purpose stated in clause 1.
 2. The customers shall not conduct any alteration, reverse-engineering(Analyzing the detail of its content, and convert it into readable form), decompile nor disassemble.
 3. The customers shall not reproduce or create a copy of This Software (neither in part or entire Software). Except for using This Software accordingly to this contract.
 4. The customers shall not sell, distribute, make it available to transmit, publicly transmit, loan, transfer, authorize to exploit, nor any other possible deals, neither in part or entire Software.
 5, The customers shall take full responsibility of the material they are translating using This Software. The customers shall take it into consideration not to violate the copyright act, intellectual property right, In case any trouble, such as violating the rights of any third parties, occurred while using This Software shall be resolved by the customers.
 6. The customers are permitted to use This Software only for the personal use or non-business matter. This Software shall not be used for the purpose of profit.
 
 Part 6. Limitation of Liability
 
 1. If defects are found on This Software, Our Company shall announce customers about the defect, and endeavor to fix This Software. However this shall not guarantee to give the warranty against defects. Any defects that occurred by using This Software directly or indirectly (Handset, damage of Software), Our Company shall not be responsible for such defects.
 2. Our Company shall not take any responsibility in infringement of intellectual property by using This Software, and any defects that occurred either directly or indirectly in relation to This Software.
 This Software uses word recognition and translation technology. Our Company shall not take any responsibility in its, precision or accuracy of word recognition and translation technology, Transferring the translated data, nor any other use of this service safety, conformity and precision.
 4. Our Company shall terminate the service without prior notice to customers in following cases.
 (1)In case of maintenance or inspection of This Software
 (2)In case This Software cannot provide the service due to fire, power failure, or natural disaster such as earthquake, flood and any other causes.
 (3)In case of system failure of This Software.
 (4)In case Our Company decides to pause This Software unavoidably due to operational or technical issues.
 5. Any damage or loss that occurred caused by any stated occasion in the preceding paragraph, Our Company shall not take any responsibility, in exception if the customer made a separate agreement.
 
 Part. 7 Compensation of Damages/Cancellation of Agreement
 
 1. In case the customers violate This Agreement, Our Company shall cancel This Agreement and claim the compensation for damages.
 2. In case of the cancellation of This Agreement stated in the preceding paragraph, the customers shall immediately terminate the use of This Software. In case Our Company directs the next action, the customers must follow the given instruction and return all software to Our Company, or shall delete This Software from customer handset until the state which This Software cannot regenerate.
 
 Part. 8 Other
 1. In case the customers carry out This Software outside its own country, the customers shall comply with the Export and Import Transaction Act of the country that shall be applicable. The customers shall be responsible for any actions that were violated from This Agreement, and resolve on its own.
 2. The customers shall not be permitted to transfer its position or rights that stated in This Agreement.
 3. Our Company shall make modification to This Software if necessary, without the prior notice to the customers.
 4. This Agreement and any non-contractual obligations arising from or connected with it shall be governed by the Laws of Japan without regards to the principles of conflicts of laws and This Agreement shall be construed in accordance with the Tokyo District Court as the court of first instance.
 5. The Japanese language version of This Agreement shall be the only controlling version, and the translations thereof into any other languages shall have no legal binding effect.
